question: Which of the following is the full form of UNCTAD?
option1: United Nations Conference on Trade and Development
option2: United Nations Conference on Military Training and Education
option3: United Nations Conference on Education and Development
answer: United Nations Conference on Trade and Development
explanation: UNCTAD stands for the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development. It was established in 1964 as a permanent intergovernmental body. UNCTAD is the part of the United Nations Secretariat dealing with trade, investment, and development issues.
